We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private MovingAverageConvergenceDivergence _macd;
// In Initialize()
_macd = MACD(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, signalPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_macd.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Fast", _macd.Fast);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Slow", _macd.Slow);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Signal", _macd.Signal);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Histogram", _macd.Histogram);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Is Ready", _macd.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Warm Up Period", _macd.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Current", _macd.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Name", _macd.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Samples", _macd.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.macd = self.MACD(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, signalPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.macd.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Fast", self.macd.Fast);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Slow", self.macd.Slow);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Signal", self.macd.Signal);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Histogram", self.macd.Histogram);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Is Ready", self.macd.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Warm Up Period", self.macd.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Current", self.macd.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Name", self.macd.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MACD Samples", self.macd.Samples);
